channel.title: Clear the dropdown list
channel.description: Hello! How can I clear the dropdown list or check all values on it using the addition parameters? I want to clear all multiple values by clicking the parameter. Example: I have the dropdown list with 20 values, by default - all values are selected, but I want choice only one values. Now, I shoud unselect all values except one.

item.title: Clear the dropdown list

item.description:
Hello!
How can I clear the dropdown list or check all values on it using the addition parameters? I want to clear all multiple values by clicking the parameter. Example: I have the dropdown list with 20 values, by default - all values are selected, but I want choice only one values. Now, I shoud unselect all values except one.
